Detailed Description

Power Domain Manager (PDM) interface implementation.

The Power Domain Manager (PDM) implements the following:

  • Interface to set the power state of the power domain (PD).
  • Interface to set the logic retention state when the PD is in retention.
  • Interface to request low power state change for the power domain.
  • Interface to set the memory retention state for the memory in the power domain.
  • Interface to read the power state of the power domain.
  • Interface to read the state of the logic in the power domain.
  • Interface to check if the power domain transition is complete.
  • Interface to read the last power state of the power domain.
  • Interface to read the memory bank status of a given memory in the power domain.

Function Documentation

static pmErrCode_t PmhalPdmIsLogicRetStateValid ( pmhalPrcmPdId_t  pdId,
pmhalPrcmPdLogicRetState_t  logicState 
)
static

This API verifies if the Logic retention state provided is valid or not for a given power domain.

Parameters
pdIdUnique ID of the power domain to be checked.
logicStateLogic Retention State provided.
Return values
retValStatus of the API call. Can be any of the following PM_SUCCESS Indicates the Logic Retention state is correct. PM_BADARGS Indicates the Logic Retention state is not supported for the given power domain.
static pmErrCode_t PmhalPdmIsLowPwrReqValid ( pmhalPrcmPdId_t  pdId,
pmhalPrcmPdLowPwrStateChangeType_t  lowPwrReq 
)
static

This API verifies if the Low Power Request provided is valid or not for a given power domain.

Parameters
pdIdUnique ID of the power domain to be checked.
lowPwrReqLow Power Request provided.
Return values
retValStatus of the API call. Can be any of the following PM_SUCCESS Indicates the lowPwrReq is correct. PM_BADARGS Indicates the lowPwrReq is not supported for the given power domain.
static pmErrCode_t PmhalPdmIsMemBankIdValid ( pmhalPrcmPdId_t  pdId,
pmhalPrcmPhyMemBankId_t  memBankId 
)
static

This API verifies if the memory bank Id provided is valid and belongs to a given power domain.

Parameters
pdIdUnique ID of the power domain to be checked.
memBankIdUnique ID of the memory bank.
Return values
retValStatus of the API call. Can be any of the following PM_SUCCESS Indicates the memory bank ID is correct. PM_BADARGS Indicates the memory bank ID is not supported for the given power domain or memory bank ID is invalid.
pmErrCode_t PmhalPdmIsMemRetStateValid ( pmhalPrcmPhyMemBankId_t  memBankId,
uint32_t  memoryRetState 
)

This API verifies if the memory bank retention status to be programmed if valid or not for the given memory bank.

Parameters
memBankIdUnique ID of the memory bank.
memoryRetStateMemory Retention Status given as an input.
Return values
retValStatus of the API call. Can be any of the following PM_SUCCESS Indicates the memory retention request is valid. PM_BADARGS Indicates the memory retention request is not supported for the given memory bank ID.
static pmErrCode_t PmhalPdmIsPDIdValid ( pmhalPrcmPdId_t  pdId)
static

This API verifies if the power domain Id is valid or not.

Parameters
pdIdUnique ID of the power domain to be checked.
Return values
errorStatusStatus of the API call. Can be any of the following PM_SUCCESS Indicates the operation is success PM_INPUT_PARAM_BAD_POWER_DOMAIN_ID Indicates the power domain ID is invalid.
static pmErrCode_t PmhalPdmIsPowerStateValid ( pmhalPrcmPdId_t  pdId,
pmhalPrcmPdState_t  pdState 
)
static

This API verifies if the power domain state provided is valid or not for a given power domain.

Parameters
pdIdUnique ID of the power domain to be checked.
pdStatePower Domain state provided.
Return values
retValStatus of the API call. Can be any of the following PM_SUCCESS Indicates the power domain state is correct. PM_BADARGS Indicates the power domain state is not supported for the given power domain.
